name: 8 Ball Pro - Pool Billiards
description:
Do you love 8 ball Billiards? Great! Now you can try your skills in this Realistic 3D physics Ball Pool billiards Game!
Ball Pool Billiards is a popular classical game in most countries of the world, such as бильярд in Russian, ビリヤ ド in Japan, billiard in Germany, and billiard américain in France.

The new version, more interesting!
-Connecting the social account
-Free Chests available every 24 hours
-Coin rewards more than 20 times per day
-Level Challenge - 100 coins to enter, top prize of 540 coins
-New fantastic cues for you to choose
-Ranking rules updated

Pool Billiards Features:

1. Single Player Mode.
2. Online Player Mode.
3. Challenge Mode: more then 60 Challenging Levels.
4. Realistic 3D physics ball animation.
5. 8 Ball Pool Mode and 9 Ball Pool Mode.

How to play the 8 Ball Pro - Pool Billiards:
(1) Challenge Mode: (Player vs Computer)
Play against the AI with standard rules, making these extra tricky shots practice in the game and you'll see that your real life skill will increase as well.

(2) Single Mode (Single Player)
Play against the computer AI with 8 Ball or 9 Ball Pool, like in a professional snooker match.

(3) Online Mode (Multi Players)
Play against the other Ball Pool players or the snooker from all over the world, enjoy arcade gameplay with other players.

Welcome to the 8 Ball Pro - Pool Billiards game! This is the most popular Pool game in appStore market and it's totally FREE. Download now and have a try on it!
